DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy tolerability travoprost 0.004 % vs. bimatoprost 0.01 % office hour period ( 4 pm 8 pm ) subject open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension 6 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Intraocular Pressure ( IOP ) Control Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension Treated With Travoprost 0.004 % ( TRAVATAN® Z ) Bimatoprost 0.01 % ( LUMIGAN® )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis openangle glaucoma ( OAG ) ocular hypertension ( OHT ) least one eye . Nonstudy eye : Intraocular pressure ( IOP ) able control pharmacologic therapy study medicine alone . Willing discontinue use ocular hypotensive medication prior receive study medication entire course study . Able follow instruction , self instill study article , attend study visit . Bestcorrected Snellen visual acuity 20/200 good eye . Sign Ethics Committee review approve informed consent form . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Known medical history allergy , hypersensitivity poor tolerance component preparation use study . Any abnormality prevent applanation tonometry either eye . Dry eye previously currently treat punctal plug , punctal cautery , Restasis® , topical ocular corticosteroid . Concurrent infectious/noninfectious conjunctivitis , keratitis uveitis either eye . Intraocular conventional laser surgery > 3 month prior consent . Risk visual field visual acuity worsen consequence participation study , investigator 's best judgment . Progressive retinal optic nerve disease cause . Use systemic medication know affect IOP stable course least 7 day prior Screening anticipate change dosage course study . Any clinically significant , serious , severe medical condition . Women childbearing potential pregnant , lactating , use reliable mean birth control . Participation study within 30 day prior Screening . Use systemic ( oral ) , injectable topical steroid . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
